actions.committee: House Committee on Economic and Educational Opportunities
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Economic and Educational Opportunities. Oversight, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Economic and Educational Opportunities
actions.subcommittee: Postsecondary Education, Training and Life-Long Learning
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Postsecondary Education, Training and Life-Long Learning.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Postsecondary Education, Training and Life-Long Learning

official_title: To authorize funds to further the public service mission of the Joseph W. Martin, Jr. Institute for Law and Society.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of Education to provide funds to a specified college to assist in the construction of a facility and the sponsorship of programming which will promote the coordination and availability of responsive community-based services for the citizens of southeastern Massachusetts.

titles.title: To authorize funds to further the public service mission of the Joseph W. Martin, Jr. Institute for Law and Society.
